title: The H and Zambos: A Winning Combination
content: “Zambos and La H renew pact of passion for Honduran soccer until 2026” On a stage full of excitement in Tegucigalpa, Zambos and the Honduran National Soccer Federation (Fenafuth) have sealed an exciting commitment of more than six years, extending it until 2026. This agreement is a passionate ode to Honduran soccer, embracing all teams and promoting fun through the Zambos Kids Cup. With Zambos, Honduran soccer continues to grow and shine with vibrant colors, as the brand’s commitment becomes an anthem to the shared passion for the sport. The story continues, and the future is promising with Zambos and Fenafuth at the heart of national soccer.
